utils.visualization package

Submodules

utils.visualization.csv_utils module

Utility functions for saving training data to csv files.

utils.visualization.csv_utils.save_config_to_csv(config)

Save the config to a csv file.

Parameters

config (dict) – The config dictionary.

Returns

The config dataframe.

Return type

pd.DataFrame

utils.visualization.csv_utils.save_to_file(components: List[environment.dummy_env_rectangular_pin.Component], actions: List[Tuple[int]], file_path: str)

Save components and actions to the folder specified by file_path.

Parameters

  • components (List[Component]) – List of components.

  • actions (List[Tuple[int]]) – List of actions.

  • file_path (str) – Path to the folder where the files will be saved.
